en-UK.name: Beilu Preset Engine
en-UK.description: SillyTavern-compatible preset management engine for prompt assembly.
en-UK.description_markdown: The **Beilu Preset Engine** provides full SillyTavern preset format compatibility. It manages prompt ordering (system-level `prompt_order` + injection-level `injection_depth`), macro expansion, marker mapping, and preset import/export.
